Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:06.51]I drank straight to my head
[00:08.93]I went outside to smoke a cigarette
[00:12.29]And I shattered my phone on the cement
[00:15.64]But I don't give a fuck
[00:19.81]Now I'm not making sense
[00:22.25]I'm laughing at a joke that I don't get
[00:25.72]I'm acting like these strangers are my friends
[00:29.04]But I don't give a fuck
[00:32.48]Yelling at the DJ "Bro your shit is boring"
[00:35.90]Doing things that I will not regret until the morning
[00:39.19]I'mma make it rain down, now the round is on me
[00:42.54]I'm just here for fun and I don't care about the money, hey hey
[00:46.62]
[00:46.63]Oh, whoa-oh-oh
[00:49.19]Nothing lasts forever
[00:50.72]But wouldn't it be nice to stay together for the night?
[00:54.21]Whoa-oh-oh
[00:55.85]We can do whatever
[00:57.43]As long as we're together then we're gonna be alright
[01:00.47]Don't leave, just wait
[01:02.50]You can tell your friends that you're staying out late, singing

[01:34.19]You could call me shameless
